name: The Gunfighter & The Ghost
description:
The Gunfighter & The Ghost

A top down shooter set in the Wild West. 

The Gunfighter has returned from death, with The Ghost of himself attached to his back. Only by working together can they defeat the monsters haunting this land. 

Blast your way through three stages of enemies including a boss battle. 

ESC - Release Mouse Cursor / Exit

WASD keys - MOVEMENT

Left Click - SHOOT as Cowboy

Right Click - SHOOT as Ghost

The Ghost can attack all enemies. The Cowboy can not attack the ghost enemies. 

The Ghost has no reload time. The Cowboy must wait shortly between shots. 

Created for the gamedev.js 2021 jam 

Made with phaser.js

Assets used from this amazing free asset pack : https://bakudas.itch.io/generic-oldwest-pack. Including music: Song - First Encounter by Allan Oliveira
